select PD.product_detail_id AS productDetailId , P.product_id AS productId, PD.product_detail_price AS productDetailPrice, PD.product_detail_quantity AS productDetailQuantity, PD.product_detail_description AS productDetailDescription , PD.product_caution_level AS productCautionLevel, P.product_name AS productName, p.product_price as productPrice
from product_detail PD INNER JOIN product P ON PD.product_id = P.product_id where PD.product_id = #{product_id}
